thread.title: Jersey 4th best small airport
thread.title_full: Jersey 4th best small airport | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Jersey 4th best small airport
text:
Jersey Airport Jersey Airport has been rated the 4th best small airport, alongside Southampton, in a Which? survey.
The Channel Islands airport also received a satisfaction rate of 78%.
That's a rise of 2% on the previous year.
It also got a five star rating for its security process and the availability and comfort of seating, as well as being highly rated for baggage reclaim services.
Last updated Fri 2 Oct 2015 Travel Jersey
